pkgmetadata.longdescription: High Performance Algorithms for Vine Copula Modeling // Provides an interface to 'vinecopulib', a high performance C++ library based on 'Boost', 'Eigen' and 'NLopt'. It provides high- performance implementations of the core features of the popular 'VineCopula' package, in particular inference algorithms for both vine copula and bivariate copula models. Advantages over VineCopula are a sleaker and more modern API, shorter runtimes, especially in high dimensions, nonparametric and multi- parameter families.
